short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save LinkedIn profiles to your Google Sheet in 1 click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send to Sheets: Save LinkedIn profiles to your Google Sheet in 1 click

Effortlessly save LinkedIn profiles to your Google Sheets with just one click! 

With Send to Sheets, you can:

1. Capture Profiles Instantly: Quickly add LinkedIn profiles directly to your Google Sheets without the hassle of manual entry.

2. Organise Your Connections: Keep track of your networking efforts, job prospects, and business connections in a structured format.

3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design that makes saving profiles a breeze, even for non-tech-savvy users.

This Extension helps you save the following data from LinkedIn 
1. Name	
2. Headline	
3. Location	
4. LinkedIn URL
5. Email (Coming soon)
6. Title	
7. Company

for feature requests or support, email us at sendtosheets@gmail.com
